DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine effective duloxetine treat woman 65 year age old symptom stress urinary incontinence , combination stress urinary incontinence urge urinary incontinence symptom .
DOC.brief_title: To Determine How Effective Duloxetine Treating Women 65 Years Older With Symptoms Stress Urinary Incontinence , With Combination Stress Urinary Incontinence Urge Urinary Incontinence Symptoms
DOC.criteria: female outpatient great equal 65 year age symptom SUI stresspredominant MUI least 3 consecutive month least 7 incontinence episode per week . For patient MUI , least 50 % IEF must due stress . ambulatory able use toilet independently without difficulty Visit 1 positive urine culture history four urinary tract infection ( UTIs ) precede year continence surgery receive bladder neck bulk agent therapy within 3 month prior study entry begin pelvic floor muscle exercise ( example , Kegel biofeedback ) within 3 month prior study entry time study . neurologic lesion condition ( e.g . multiple sclerosis , spinal cord lesion Parkinson 's disease ) local lesion ( e.g . bladder stone present tumor ) affect low urinary tract . intake monoamine oxidase inhibitor ( MAOIs ) within 14 day prior randomisation time study
